English to Chinese Translation

I followed the tutorial online which implements a Neural Machine Translation System in Keras from Scratch from English to German while I built a translation from English to Chinese.

The dataset I used to train the model is downloaded from ManyThings/anki

DL Model

There are 19777 Chinese -- English pairs from the anki download

In total, 10,000 pairs were used to train the model, among which, 90% as training and 10% as validation

Parameters epochs=30, batch_size=64 were used in model training

Text translation example

The input is an English sentence, and the output is translated Chinese and rference Chinese
